Posts.EditableText: Is there any way that   the players health can't exceed a certain number. Say if you have a total of 150 health and you are at 100 and when you use a potion you gain back 75 health.... could you make it so the health afterwards would stop at 150 instead of being 175/150
Posts.HTML: Is there any way that   the players health can't exceed a certain number. Say if you have a total of 150 health and you are at 100 and when you use a potion you gain back 75 health.... could you make it so the health afterwards would stop at 150 instead of being 175/150

Posts.EditableText:
Here's an example if the current health is a variable and the max health is a property:

[code:nkvr0i0a]
if (%currenthealth% > $Objectproperty(objectname;health)$) { set <health; $objectproperty(objectname;health)$> }
[/code:nkvr0i0a]
